attributes.action: Britain does NOT want a referendum to leave the EU
attributes.additional_details:
The vast majority of the British public are content with our place in Europe. We see our place in the centre of Europe. Current problems just serve to show that we need to act in a concerted manner to solve our problems.

This e-petition is a counter to the "Britain wants referendum to leave EU" e-petition and is to register the people's opposition to that petition..

We, the undersigned, don't want a referendum on Europe.
